samples.name: Basic
samples.description: Basic example showing most controls which are intended to be used inside a table.

samples.name: Selection
samples.description: Selection example showing selection modes and selection behaviors of table.

samples.name: Sorting
samples.description: Example showing the different kinds of sorting capabilities.

samples.name: Filtering
samples.description: Example showing the different facets of filtering within a table.

samples.name: Aggregations
samples.description: Example which shows the different aggregations of the table.

samples.name: Table related Menus
samples.description: Example which focuses the handling of the table related Menus.

samples.name: Table Freeze
samples.description: Example which shows table freeze with fixed columns.

samples.name: Resizing
samples.description: Example for column resizing and the different row count modes.

samples.name: OData Metadata
samples.description: Shows an example how an oData metadata driven table creation can look like

samples.name: JSONTreeBinding
samples.description: Basic example showing how a TreeTable can be build by using a JSONModel

samples.name: Basic OData TreeBinding
samples.description: Illustrates how to bind to data from an OData model without using $metadata annotations or navigation properties. Instead, treeAnnotationProperties is filled for the TreeBinding.

samples.name: OData Annotations TreeBinding
samples.description: Illustrates how to bind to data from an OData model using $metadata annotations.
